document_data.name: Simbulmyn
document_data.mainbody: The '''Simbulmyn''', also known as the '''Simbul's Guard''', was the personal guard of [[Alassra Silverhand|the Simbul]].
document_data.Possessions: [[Human]], [[elf|elven]], and [[half-elven]] members of the Simbulmyn were given powerful [[enchanted]] ''[[Simbulmyn bracers|bracers]]'' that granted them iron will and unnatural toughness.
document_data.History: In [[1374 DR]], the Simbulmyn was commanded by High Captain [[Hovor Seawind]].
